scripts.build:js-worker: webpack build ./wasm-worker.js --mode production --target webworker -o dist --output-filename wasm-worker.js
scripts.build:wasm: rustup run nightly wasm-pack build .. --target web --out-dir pkg -- -Z build-std=panic_abort,std
scripts.build:main: webpack build ./index.js --mode production -o dist --output-filename index.js && cp index.html dist/ && cp service-worker.js dist/
scripts.build:all: npm run build:clean && npm run build:wasm && npm run build:main && npm run build:worker
